author: RT
title: White House Press Secretary â€˜Spicyâ€™ lampooned for second time in SNL skit (VIDEO)
text:
White House Press Secretary â€˜Spicyâ€™ lampooned for second time in SNL skit (VIDEO) Published time: 12 Feb, 2017 14:42 Edited time: 12 Feb, 2017 14:43 Get short URL Â© Saturday Night Live / YouTube The Trump administration isnâ€™t having an easy ride, and the latest edition of Saturday Night Live didnâ€™t hold back its punches either, with White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer lampooned once again. 
Seemingly having taken the actual Spicerâ€™s advice to â€œdial backâ€ to heart, actor Melissa McCarthy returned with â€œnew Spicyâ€ only one week after debuting her character. 
Now apparently â€œcalm,â€ Spicer tells â€œfreakâ€ Glenn Thrush of the New York Times to â€œnot f with me,â€ while turning a leaf blower on another member of media. Spicey is really blowing away the White House press corps. #SNL pic.twitter.com/HSbKAX07zz â€” Saturday Night Live (@nbcsnl) February 12, 2017 
Spicy also explains â€œextreme vettingâ€ with the use of â€œdollies,â€ while also touching on a list of â€œterrorist incidentsâ€ that the media â€œnever even write about,â€ including â€œthe Bowling Green Massacre, the horror in Six Flags, the slaughter at Fraggle Rock, and the Night They Drove Old Dixie Down.â€ Couldn't make this any more clear. #SNL pic.twitter.com/7i1rHvsi7V â€” Saturday Night Live (@nbcsnl) February 12, 2017 
Referring to Nordstromâ€™s ditching of Ivanka Trumpâ€™s clothing brand as â€œlight terrorism,â€ Spicer turns the briefing into a shopping channel selling one of Ivankaâ€™s bracelets, which Spicer is wearing. Don't even get Spicey started on Nordstrom pulling Ivanka Trump's clothing line. #SNL pic.twitter.com/pmf08pQNUq â€” Saturday Night Live (@nbcsnl) February 12, 2017 
â€œThese babies are a real head turner,â€ Spicer adds, while lifting her leg into the air to show off one of her leopard print shoes. 
Trump was reportedly â€œrattledâ€ by Spicer being played by woman, with SNL turning the screw even further this week by having Kate McKinnon play the part of Trumpâ€™s new attorney general, Jeff Sessions, who tells the press that â€œthere are two kinds of crime, regular and black,â€ before Spicer pushes him off the podium. 
McCarthy played Spicer for the first time on Saturday February 4, after which Spicer himself told Extra that, while the skit was â€œfunny,â€ he thought the actor â€œneeds to slow down on the gum chewing; way too many pieces in there,â€ adding that she â€œcould dial backâ€ a bit. The people playing the characters on SNL are now probably more qualified to do the job then the ppl they portray #SNLSpicer #SNL pic.twitter.com/i4WOcjE5aC â€” Nasty Woman (@NastyWoman20) February 12, 2017 I don't mind at all that SNL makes fun of Trump Administration. What's disturbing is the liberals who get their news watching it. #SNLSpicer â€” Erika~Build Our Wall (@ms_erika74) February 12, 2017 The only thing funnier than #SNL is watching whiny Trump voters bitch and moan about being ridiculed. #SNLSpicer â€” Kiffin Eckert (@k_r_eckert) February 12, 2017 So far Donald Trump has made only one thing great again: Saturday Night Live! ğŸ‘ŒğŸ˜„ #SNLSpicer â€” Hafiz Shariff (@HafizDoc) February 12, 2017 
Trump has lashed out at SNL on a number of occasions for its satirization of him and his administration, branding the show â€œunwatchableâ€ and â€œnot funnyâ€ in a December tweet. 
He has yet to publicly comment on the comedy showâ€™s latest sketches.
